scripts.release:check: npm run verify && npm -w @enginehq/core pack --dry-run && npm -w @enginehq/auth pack --dry-run && npm -w @enginehq/express pack --dry-run && npm -w enginehq pack --dry-run
scripts.release:publish: npm run verify && npm publish -w @enginehq/core && npm publish -w @enginehq/auth && npm publish -w @enginehq/express && npm publish -w enginehq
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
